description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take the role of Ethel, a little witch who has to pay for her school by working at an Ice Cream shop. Serve as many customers as you can as fast as possible or else you will lose reputation. Keep your reputation up and meet the hourly quota to survive the first day at work.
description.short: Take the role of Ethel, a little witch who has to pay for her school by working at an Ice Cream shop. Serve as many customers as you can as fast as possible or else you will lose reputation. Keep your reputation up and meet the hourly quota to survive the first day at work.
